about_the_game:
Amulet at Watcher's Pool 5E

By: T.M. van Dalen RPG



Rescue a powerful amulet from the clutches of an evil cult in this adventure for fifth edition! This one-shot adventure for 4th level characters will bring your party into the dangerous Spiritlands, a deserted area in Freebone Vale. There, a group of cultists that have split off from the Church of Enas have managed to take over a temple. Can you recover the amulet of the watcher before it's too late?
Amulet at Watcher's Pool is a 4-6 hour adventure for Tier 1 Characters (optimized for APL 4).
